Translations.Text: Vony nenavydily yikh z niyakoyi inshoyi prychyny nizh viryachoyi v BOHU, Mohutnʹomu, Praiseworthy
Yomu nalezhytʹ tsaryuvannyu neba ta zemli. Ta BOH zasvidchuye vsi rechi
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto peresliduyutʹ viryachyy lyudyam ta zhinkam, todi ne spromozhutʹsya shchob kayatysya, zaznaly retribution Gehenna; vony zaznaly retribution horyachoho
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto vvazhaly ta pryviv spravedlyve zhyttya, zasluzhyly park z techuchymy potokamy. Tse yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh velykyy triumf
Diysno, vash udar Lorda ye suvoryy
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto vystupaye z initsiatyvoyu ta povtoryuyetʹsya
Ta Vin yavlyaye soboyu Probachayutʹ, Naybilʹsh Lyub'yaznyy
Tsey khto disbelieve muchatʹsya z sprostuvannyam
